statements: DELETE FROM weather_sensor_data WHERE station_id = 'ee22b7e9-235f-4be1-8816-57da9c0377aa' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM WeatherStationData WHERE station_id = 3 AND temperature > 25
DELETE FROM climate_analysis WHERE region = 'North' AND analysis_date = '2022-09-15';
DELETE FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 40;
DELETE FROM crop_sensor WHERE sensor_type = 'moisture_sensor' AND data < 0.5;
DELETE FROM crop_yield WHERE crop_name = 'Rice' AND season = 'Summer';
DELETE FROM soil_data WHERE ph_level < 6.5 AND mineral_content > 0.1;
